title: sundials+pthread fails to build on Ubuntu16.04 + gcc 5.4.0
body:
```
[ 89%] Building C object examples/idas/serial/CMakeFiles/idasSlCrank_dns.dir/idasSlCrank_dns.c.o
cd /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/sundials-2.7.0-cmwi46u5mqjo5gkh2bbbk6ogct66uzto/sundials-2.7.0/build/examples/idas/serial && /home/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc  -I/home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/sundials-2.7.0-cmwi46u5mqjo5gkh2bbbk6ogct66uzto/sundials-2.7.0/include -I/home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/sundials-2.7.0-cmwi46u5mqjo5gkh2bbbk6ogct66uzto/sundials-2.7.0/build/include  -fPIC -O2 -g -DNDEBUG   -o CMakeFiles/idasSlCrank_dns.dir/idasSlCrank_dns.c.o   -c /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/sundials-2.7.0-cmwi46u5mqjo5gkh2bbbk6ogct66uzto/sundials-2.7.0/examples/idas/serial/idasSlCrank_dns.c
../../../src/nvec_pthreads/libsundials_nvecpthreads.so.2.7.0: undefined reference to `pthread_create'
../../../src/nvec_pthreads/libsundials_nvecpthreads.so.2.7.0: undefined reference to `pthread_join'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

@gardner48 do you have any ideas?
